name: 山间有点田-Sweet In the Mountains
name_original: 山间有点田-Sweet In the Mountains
description:
This is a casual work about farming and raising babies. When you open your eyes and find yourself come into ancient times. Living in a desolate mountain, a broken house, a remote country, How do you survive? Don't be afraid!? Don't be afraid! You can choose to be a lazy person, or you can aspire to be a diligent person. From poverty to the peak of life, you need farming, grazing, fishing, farming and buying land to maintain the survival of your family; Shop business house, earn money to strive for a better life; Into the palace as an official, promotion Jin Jue king, finally find a lover hand in hand to brilliant!

Features

This is a farming + cultivation + plot work. Develop no target Settings, no numbers. The plot to the player can choose to skip to develop, young master, scholar, killer, prince, businessman a variety of types you can choose.

Exquisite character image, exciting plot design, smooth operation experience, in both the formation and plot setting, feeling unique life experience.

Farmland planting: You can turn barren mountains into good fields. It is not easy to get all kinds of vegetables and fruits. How to arrange all depends on your preferences.

Reclamation of pasture: you can raise a group of chickens, ducks, cattle and sheep, which can solve the food and sell it for money. You can even fish in the pond, raise fish, drive a boat to catch fish, plant lotus and dig lotus roots.

DIY house, from the mountain to the mansion, indoor full range of supporting, to build a unique home belongs to you.

Career Development: You can choose different careers, doctor, cook, agricultural specialist, engineer. In ancient times, your professional background would have given you different advantages.

Map Exploration: Hidden maps can collect landscape maps, and collected scenes can be converted into skill points.


Game Play

The game operation is simple, novice can also easily start.

There are many hidden plots in the work. We need to explore carefully, discover the hidden stories

The opening choice of different classes can unlock different skills, the main story will follow the events will not break the line.

Plot to the player can get lanterns skip the formative part only walk the plot, formative to the player can use lanterns to exchange for a long-term stay in the female bag to save cooking time to get through the poverty period as soon as possible.
